==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
Attested in Old Chinese; original meanings were “to be able to, competent”, “can be achieved, possible”.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=kěnéng
|c=ho2 nang4
|h=pfs=khó-nèn
|md=kō̤-nèng
|mn=tw,xm,zz:khó-lêng/qz:khóⁿ-nn̂g
|mna=Taiwanese-Alternation2to1Word.ogg
|mn-t=ko2 lêng5/ko2 nêng5
|mn-t_note=ko2 lêng5 - Chaozhou
|w=2khu nen
|mc=1,2
|oc=1,1;3,3
|ma=y
|cat=a,adv,n,v
}}

===Adjective===
{{zh-adj}}

# [[possible]]; [[probable]]; [[likely]]

====Usage notes====
Chinese does not have different words for ''possible'' and ''probable'' in the way that English does. To express the sense that something is probable - i.e. likely to happen, as opposed to just being a possibility among others - consider adding {{zh-l|很}} before {{lang|zh|可能}} or {{zh-l|有可能}}.

===Adverb===
{{zh-adv}}

# [[maybe]]; [[perhaps]]; [[probably]]; [[might]], [[may]]
#: {{zh-x|可能 我 會 去。|'''Perhaps''' I will go.}}
#: {{zh-x|他 可能 被 開除 了。|He '''may''' have been fired.}}

====Synonyms====
* {{zh-l|或許}}
* {{zh-l|也許}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[possibility]]; [[probability]] {{zh-mw|個}}
#: {{zh-x|什麼 事 都 有 發生 的 可能。|Anything has a '''possibility''' of happening.}}

===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# {{lb|zh|literary}} to be [[competent]] to; to have the [[ability]] to
#: {{zh-x|孟 ^莊 子 之 孝 也，其他 可能 也。|The filial piety of {{w|Mencius|Meng}} {{w|Zhuangzi|Zhuang}}, in other matters, was what other men '''are competent to'''.|CL|ref=Analects}}
# {{lb|zh|literary}} can be [[achieve]]d; to be [[possible]]
#: {{zh-x|養，可能 也，敬 為{wéi} 難。|One '''may be able''' to support them; the difficulty is in doing so with the proper reverence.|CL|ref=Liji}}

==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|か|のう|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=かのう}} compound {{m|zh|可能|tr=kha<sup>X</sup> nong|lit=may, can + able, ability}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|かのう|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Adjective===
{{ja-adj|infl=na|かのう}}

# [[possible]]
# [[feasible]]

====Inflection====
{{ja-na|かのう}}

====Derived terms====
* {{ja-r|可%能%性|か%のう%せい}}: (possibility, feasibility)

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|できる}}
* {{sense|possible}} {{ja-r|ありうる}}, {{ja-r|起こりうる|おこりうる}}

====Antonyms====
{{sense|possible}}
* {{ja-r|ありえない}}, {{ja-r|不%可%能|ふ%か%のう}}: [[impossible]]
* {{ja-r|必%然%的|ひつ%ぜん%てき}}: [[inevitable]]

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かのう}}

# [[possibility]], good [[chance]]
#: {{ja-usex|可能の|かのう の|possible}}
# [[feasibility]]

====Antonyms====
* {{sense|possibility}} {{ja-r|不%可%能|ふ%か%のう}}: [[impossible]]; {{ja-r|必%然%的|ひつ%ぜん%てき}}: [[inevitable]]
* {{sense|feasibility}} {{ja-r|不%可%能|ふ%か%のう}}: ([[infeasibility]])
